titocc.compiler.elements

Class CodeElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.compiler.elements.CodeElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArgumentList, Declaration, Declarator, Expression, Parameter, ParameterList, Statement, TranslationUnit, TypeSpecifier

    public abstract class CodeElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base for all the code elements. Stores the position of the element within the source file so that it can be used by compiler messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CodeElement(int line, int column)
      Constructs a code element.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getColumn()
      Returns the column/character where the code element starts.
      int getLine()
      Returns the line number where the code element starts.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the code element for testing and debugging purposes.
